name: Playable Mockup
description:
Explore an infinite loop corridor and get to 0 PM to 0 AM by building a "Time manipulation deck".

Playable Mockup is a first person horror exploration game where you will be challenged with a life threatening test.
Wander the “Dead Soul Corridor” created from a ghost photo. Find a way to get to the soul of the dead.

Corridor’s will always start at 0 PM.
Your objective is to capture the soul of the dead awaiting at 0 AM
Advance the corridor time by obtaining abilities through taking photos.

Key factors of the game


  • Proceed in an infinite looping corridor
  • Strategize how to escape the loop
  • Think deeply in a silent and eerie atmosphere
  • Luck will be a big factor determining the outcome, which requires you to challenge multiple times
  • “Investigate” the ghost’s identity and the culprit that has taken it’s life
